articles.title: Wimbledon: Nadal withdraws due to injury, Kyrgios through to first Grand Slam final - Premium Times
articles.description: The 22-time glam slam winner, despite his injury woes, thrilled spectators with his comeback in a five-set victory over American Taylor Fritz on Wednesday.

articles.title: James Caan, best known for playing Sonny Corleone in The Godfather, dies at 82 - Hindustan Times
articles.description: American actor James Caan, best known for playing Sonny Corleone in Francis Ford Coppola's The Godfather, has died at the age of 82.
